values: 玻璃；玻璃杯；一玻璃杯；一玻璃杯的量；杯中的饮料；玻璃制品；玻璃器皿；（～es）眼镜；（～es）望远镜；气压计；晴雨表；<英>镜子；（Glass）格拉斯（人名）
给…装玻璃；用玻璃罩住；用玻璃盖住；围绕…建起玻璃结构；反映

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 像玻璃的；光亮透明的；呆滞的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指周边垂直，不用茶托的有柄大瓷杯或大金属杯。
指有柄，用来饮茶或咖啡等的瓷杯。
指玻璃制的杯子，用来盛酒和牛奶等东西。

word_group.brief_definition: 玻璃砂布；玻璃纤维织物
有花边状纹饰的玻璃器皿
浮法平板玻璃；浮法玻璃

bilingual.source: The glass is washed, melted and made into new glass.
bilingual.target: 玻璃被清洗、熔化并制成新玻璃。
他昨晚打碎了一个玻璃杯。

bilingual.source: Drink a glass of milk every day.
I work in a tall, glass building.
bilingual.target: 我在一栋高大的玻璃建筑里工作。

bilingual.source: It's made of used wood and glass.
bilingual.target: 它是用旧木头和玻璃做的。

bilingual.source: Can I have a glass of water, please?

list.abstract: glass（英[ɡlɑs]，美[ɡlæs]），英语单词，作名词用，为玻璃；玻璃制品；透镜。作动词用，为用玻璃覆盖；给…装玻璃；用望远镜观察。短语搭配有magnifying glass（放大镜），例句为“Bury glass far away from rivers.（把玻璃埋在远离河流的地方。）” glass复数形式为glasses。
《玻璃先生》（Glass）是由M·奈特·沙马兰自编自导，詹姆斯·麦卡沃伊、布鲁斯·威利斯、塞缪尔·杰克逊、安雅·泰勒-乔伊等主演的科幻悬疑剧情电影，于2019年1月16日在印度尼西亚、菲律宾和中国台湾首映。 该片讲述了玻璃先生（塞缪尔·杰克逊 饰）发现大卫·杜恩（布鲁斯·威利斯 饰）追捕凯文·温德尔·克鲁伯（詹姆斯·麦卡沃伊 饰）的人格分裂化身之一“野兽”的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, aren't we Mr. The-Glass-ls-Half-Empty?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不是“看到杯子有一半儿空着”的人（悲观）。

yingyinNormal.en: Look around you, there's hypothetical broken glass everywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看看周围，到处都是可能存在的碎玻璃。

yingyinNormal.en: Does that make this a glass-half-full or half-empty-type situation?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算不算是考验人究竟是乐观还是悲观地看待这一情况？

yingyinNormal.en: Take that, glass ceiling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听见了吗，玻璃天花板。

yingyinNormal.en: Really, I only had two glasses. I just had a glass. Two. I had one glass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的？我才喝了两杯。我只喝了一杯。两杯。我喝了一杯。

yingyinNormal.en: His name was Roland Glass, and he has two gold records.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他叫Roland Glass 他出过两张黄金唱片。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, another glass vase. It's a grown-up present. That's why it's a bit boring. It's lovely. We'll put it with our other glass vases.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，又是一个玻璃花瓶。因为这是送给大人的礼物，所以不是特别的有趣。谢谢你们，我会把它和其它花瓶放在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, another glass vase. It's a grown-up present. That's why it's a bit boring. It's lovely. We'll put it with our other glass vases.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，又是一个玻璃花瓶。因为这是送给大人的礼物，所以不是特别的有趣。谢谢你们，我会把它和其它花瓶放在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: And that? It tried to break the glass. I like her spirit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么？它曾试图弄碎玻璃。我喜欢她的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: Please enjoy my ecosystem of love. Never tap on the glass!
yingyinNormal.zh: 请享受我爱的生态，永远不许敲鱼缸！

yingyinNormal.en: A real magnifying glass. How does it work? You hold it in front of things, and they look bigger. The magnifying glass makes the little fish look big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个真正的放大镜。这要怎么用呢？用它来看东西 ，东西都会变大。放大镜把小小的东西都放大啦。

yingyinNormal.en: A real magnifying glass. How does it work? You hold it in front of things, and they look bigger. The magnifying glass makes the little fish look big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个真正的放大镜。这要怎么用呢？用它来看东西 ，东西都会变大。放大镜把小小的东西都放大啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, is it a toy? No, it's a glass vase. That's a bit of a boring present.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，那里面是玩具吗？不，是一个玻璃花瓶。这礼物看上去有些无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'll pass on a glass of that non-premium liquor that you're drinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可不想要你正在喝的廉价酒精。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, is it a toy? No, it's a glass vase. That's a bit of a boring present.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，那里面是玩具吗？不，是一个玻璃花瓶。这礼物看上去有些无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, ladies, we killed the bottle. I had half a glass. I didn't have any.
yingyinNormal.zh: 姑娘们，我们喝完了一瓶。我只喝了半杯。我一点都没喝上。

yingyinNormal.en: Annie, may I buy you a glass of wine? No, I don't think that's a good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 安妮，我能请你喝杯酒吗？不，那样不好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be silly. Amy, how is this big glass shaft going to aid our marriage?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别犯傻了。艾米，这根玻璃大棒哪里能辅助我们的婚姻啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, can you close that window Chandler? My nipples can cut glass over here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关窗子好吗？ 我的乳头硬到可以割玻璃。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh wait, one sec. One sec. Hey you. Behind the glass. Who are you looking at.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，镜子后面的人，你看什么看？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a hard brittle usually transparent substance commonly made from sand heated with chemicals

examination_example.sentence: Eight monumental curving staircases of granite with over 4,000 individually cast bronze balusters are capped by four skylight domes and two stained <highlight>glass</highlight> rotundas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 八座巨大的花岗岩穹形楼梯以及四千多个独立铸造的青铜栏杆被四个天窗圆顶和两个彩色玻璃圆顶覆盖。

examination_example.sentence: They open the way to equality and they break through the <highlight>glass</highlight> ceiling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们打开了通往平等的道路，他们打破了玻璃天花板。

examination_example.sentence: see through the <highlight>glass</highlight> ceiling
examination_example.sentence_trans: 透过玻璃天花板看

sense_info_list.en: a pair of glass or plastic lenses held in a frame and used to help a person see clearly or to protect the eyes

examination_example.sentence: Moritz calls for the use of "a magnifying <highlight>glass</highlight>".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫里茨呼吁使用“放大镜”。

examination_example.sentence: We need to take a magnifying <highlight>glass</highlight> to that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要用放大镜来看。

examination_example.sentence: "They are our happy <highlight>glasses</highlight> that protect us from what we perceive is going to be more dangerous."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们就像是快乐的“眼睛”保护我们远离我们所认为存在的危险。

sense_info_list.en: a drinking container made of glass

examination_example.sentence: Most people would define optimism as being endlessly happy, with a <highlight>glass</highlight> that's perpetually half full.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人将乐观定义为无尽的快乐，总觉得杯子里的水还有一半。

word_usage.usage: glass ceiling （effect）玻璃天花板（效应），指某些人口群体（女性、少数民族）在职业生涯中遇到的无形障碍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a hard brittle usually transparent substance commonly made from sand heated with chemicals

examination_example.sentence: A product request was sent to eight different <highlight>glass</highlight> makers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向八家不同的玻璃制造商发送了产品请求。

examination_example.sentence: There's one thing you'll find in nearly all ads for Coca-Cola: the characteristic <highlight>glass</highlight> bottle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你几乎在所有的可口可乐广告中都能找到一样东西：独特的玻璃瓶。

examination_example.sentence: Preliminary inspections also suggested the three ornate (装饰华丽的) stained <highlight>glass</highlight> "rose" windows appeared to have survived the fire, officials said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们说，初步检查还表明，三扇华丽的彩色玻璃“玫瑰”窗似乎在火灾中幸存了下来。

sense_info_list.en: a pair of glass or plastic lenses held in a frame and used to help a person see clearly or to protect the eyes

examination_example.sentence: It works for things as boring as archaeological (考古的) museums, where people were given eye-tracking <highlight>glasses</highlight> and instructed either to take photos or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它适用于像考古博物馆那样无聊的事情，在那里，人们被赋予了眼动仪，并指示人们是否拍照。

sense_info_list.en: a drinking container made of glass

word_usage.usage:
glass作“玻璃（器皿）”时，是不可数名词，“一块玻璃”用a piece of glass表示。可用作定语。
示例：
Glass breaks easily. 玻璃易碎。
a glass door 一扇玻璃门

glass表示具体的“玻璃杯”以及“一杯之量”是可数名词。
a glass 一个杯子
a glass of milk 一杯牛奶
three glasses of cold water 三杯凉水

作“眼镜”“望远镜”时常用复数形式，“一副眼镜”要说a pair of glasses。
my glasses 我的眼镜
a pair of glasses 一副眼镜

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指有柄, 用来饮茶或咖啡等的瓷杯。
指玻璃制的杯子, 用来盛酒和牛奶等东西。
通常指周边垂直, 不用茶托的有柄大瓷杯或大金属杯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a hard brittle usually transparent substance commonly made from sand heated with chemicals

examination_example.sentence: The floor-to-ceiling windows of his company's offices overlook Songdo Central Park, with a canal full of small boats and people fishing. Shimmering (闪烁的) <highlight>glass</highlight> towers line the canal's edge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他公司办公室的落地窗俯瞰松岛中央公园，运河里挤满了小船和钓鱼的人。闪闪发光的玻璃塔排列在运河边上。

examination_example.sentence: Building a neon sign is an art practiced by professionals trained on the job to mold <highlight>glass</highlight> tubes into decorative shapes and letters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制作霓虹灯牌是一门艺术，要把玻璃管塑造成装饰性的形状和字母，由受过培训的专业人士完成。

sense_info_list.en: a pair of glass or plastic lenses held in a frame and used to help a person see clearly or to protect the eyes

examination_example.sentence: Ben Franklin, one of America's founding fathers, didn't just invent the lightning rod. His creations include <highlight>glasses</highlight>, innovative stoves and more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为美国开国元勋之一，Ben Franklin 不仅仅发明了避雷针。他的创造还包括眼镜、新型炉灶等等。

sense_info_list.en: a drinking container made of glass

examination_example.sentence: You can test yourself by drinking a large <highlight>glass</highlight> of milk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以喝一大杯牛奶来测试自己。

word_usage.usage:
glass表示具体的“玻璃杯”以及“一杯之量”是可数名词。
a glass 一个杯子
a glass of milk 一杯牛奶
three glasses of cold water 三杯凉水

glass作“玻璃（器皿）”时，是不可数名词，“一块玻璃”用a piece of glass表示。可用作定语。
示例：
Glass breaks easily. 玻璃易碎。
a glass door 一扇玻璃门

作“眼镜”“望远镜”时常用复数形式，“一副眼镜”要说a pair of glasses。
my glasses 我的眼镜
a pair of glasses 一副眼镜

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指有柄，用来饮茶或咖啡等的瓷杯。
指玻璃制的杯子，用来盛酒和牛奶等东西。
通常指周边垂直，不用茶托的有柄大瓷杯或大金属杯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Tiny pieces of <highlight>glass</highlight> were everywhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玻璃碎片到处都是。

examination_example.sentence: My daughter climbed up to grab a <highlight>glass</highlight> vase from a high shelf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我女儿爬了上去，从高高的架子上抓起一个玻璃花瓶。

examination_example.sentence: Wang believes traditions should not be sealed in <highlight>glass</highlight> boxes at museums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王认为，传统不应该封在博物馆的玻璃盒子里。

examination_example.sentence: And we'll pour about 30 percent more liquid into a short, wide <highlight>glass</highlight> than a tall, skinny <highlight>glass</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会在一个短而宽的杯子里倒入比高而细的杯子多30%的液体。

examination_example.sentence: The China Through A Looking <highlight>Glass</highlight> exhibition in New York exhibited 140 pieces of China-inspired fashionable clothing alongside Chinese works of art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在纽约举办的“中国镜花水月”展览展示了140件中国风格的时尚服装和中国艺术品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a hard brittle usually transparent substance commonly made from sand heated with chemicals

examination_example.sentence: But plastic, <highlight>glass</highlight> and paper can be recycled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是塑料、玻璃和纸张可以回收利用。

examination_example.sentence: Alice saw a small <highlight>glass</highlight> box with a small cake in it under the table
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爱丽丝看到桌子底下有一个小玻璃盒子，里面有一个小蛋糕

examination_example.sentence: Have you heard about Zhangjiajie <highlight>Glass</highlight> Footbridge?
examination_example.sentence_trans: —您听说过张家界玻璃天桥吗？

sense_info_list.en: a pair of glass or plastic lenses held in a frame and used to help a person see clearly or to protect the eyes

examination_example.sentence: If so stores can send advertisements for new <highlight>glasses</highlight> to him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果(系统可以检测是否有人戴眼镜)，商店可以向他发送新眼镜的广告。

examination_example.sentence: A: He is tall and thin with <highlight>glasses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他又高又瘦，戴着眼镜。

examination_example.sentence: Dad, about three quarters of our classmates wear <highlight>glasses</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: ——爸爸，我们四分之三的同学都戴眼镜。

sense_info_list.en: a drinking container made of glass

examination_example.sentence: I broke a few <highlight>glasses</highlight> and cut my hands while I was washing dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在洗碗的时候打碎了几个玻璃杯，割破了手。

examination_example.sentence: Sorry, Miss Wang. I broke a <highlight>glass</highlight> by accident while I was cleaning the table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: ——对不起，王小姐。 我在擦桌子的时候不小心打碎了一个玻璃杯。

examination_example.sentence: You'd better drink a <highlight>glass</highlight> of hot milk before going to bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最好在睡前喝一杯热牛奶。

word_usage.usage:
glass作“玻璃（器皿）”时，是不可数名词，“一块玻璃”用a piece of glass表示。可用作定语。
示例：
Glass breaks easily. 玻璃易碎。
a glass door 一扇玻璃门

glass表示具体的“玻璃杯”以及“一杯之量”是可数名词。
a glass 一个杯子
a glass of milk 一杯牛奶
three glasses of cold water 三杯凉水

作“眼镜”“望远镜”时常用复数形式，“一副眼镜”要说a pair of glasses。
my glasses 我的眼镜
a pair of glasses 一副眼镜
